price: 205. Мре kundola nkombo ya Nkolo nayo na kati nayo na kobanga mpe na komikitisa na mongongo ya katikati ntongo mpe mpokua. Kasi kozala te elongo na baye bazangi makanisi.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُر رَّبَّكَ فِي نَفۡسِكَ تَضَرُّعٗا وَخِيفَةٗ وَدُونَ ٱلۡجَهۡرِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ بِٱلۡغُدُوِّ وَٱلۡأٓصَالِ وَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡغَٰفِلِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur rabbaka fī nafsika taḍarruʿan wakhīfatan wadūna al-jahri mina al-qawli bil-ghuduwi wal-āṣāli walā takun mina al-ghāfilīna
